data.description: Transform your living space with smart home appliances that respond to your every command. With voice-controlled lights, fans, and even your microwave, experience a new level of convenience and control in your daily life. Embrace the future of home automation, where your voice becomes the ultimate remote for a more comfortable and efficient lifestyle.
data.title: Smart Home Appliances

data.heading: USE CASES
data.title: Join meeting with confidence from any place and any device

cards.title: Smart Stove that plays cooking videos with voice control
Turn lights and fan on and off with voice control
Smart lock that is voice controlled
Video doorbell that can make a video call to your phone

data.description: In the realm of smart home appliances, we present a versatile use case that combines voice control with cutting-edge technology to revolutionize the way we interact with our domestic environment. This use case includes four innovative products: a Voice-Controlled Smart Stove, Smart Lighting and Fan Control, a Voice-Controlled Smart Lock, and a Video Doorbell with two-way video calling capabilities.
